reviewText: My 2 year old son loves this show. And it teaches a lot as well.
This show is great for young children that love construction vehicles.  Teaches the names and parts of different Caterpillar machines. My 3-year old  LOVES watching them work.
This is all my grandson wants to watch.  He is almost 4 years old.

I have a two year old that is in LOVE with tractors - and all big equipment!  This kept his attention - as best as anything and it was fun to watch him.  I would recommend this to any of moms/dads with little boys!
Two year old grandson loves this!
A perfect gift for a small child just learning about the world we live in.
For the 3-6 year old boy, this is SO good. My Grandson about has it memorized.
What a GREAT video! Exactly what I was looking for. My 2.5 year old watches this over and over! Definitely would like to buy!
Son loved it.
My son loved it.
My son loves it!!!!
My grandson loved it!!!!

My son is obsessed with all things Caterpillar. Bags, hard hats, caps, shirts and of course toy machines. We even have the Cat train. I had to put a Cat decal on our car. This video is great and he's learning a lot about machines. Well we all are. We watch Cat Power 10 times a day. Even in the car. Catchy tunes.
My son loves this show!
Big Machine Mike is totally awesome and so is his dopey sidekick Henry.
My son love's it over and over again!!!
2 year old grandson loves it!
Perfect for young children that love construction vehicles. My two year old grandson loves it!
grandson loved it!!!

My 2 year old daughter LOVES this video.  We watch it several times a day and if it was up to her we would watch it all day long.  Its the first thing she asks for when getting out of bed.  The songs are catchy, I find myself singing them as well.  We have a lot of construction going on where we live, and she loves calling out the names of each machine as we pass them on the road.
My now 4 year old son loves this video and has it on repeat every chance.
It is great and well used by my grandson!!!!!
My son can not get enough!

It puts me to sleep but my son loves it. He was only 3 and 1/2 years old when he started watching it and he could tell you everything about construction machines. He knows each machines name and nick name, why they're name that, and the purpose of each machine. He's 5 now and still loves watching CAT Power.
IT WAS OKAY
Cheesy, but my 2yr old son LOVES it!!
GRANDSON LOVES IT WATCHES EVERYDAY
My son loves it
Very educational.  My two year old watches this nearly every day!
My son loves this program.  He watches it over and over.
My two year old loves this. It is one of the few things he will watch straight through.
My almost 2 year old loves machines and this is so much fun for him to watch
My boys, 5 and 2, love construction machines so this doesn't get any better for them (other than actually going to a construction site).
Great show for kiddo that lives construction equipment.
My son loves it
My 3 year old LOVES this.
Awesome for kids
My son loved this!
My son loves this! Very informative as well.
My 2 year old has watched this a hundred times and will probably watch it hundreds more
Essentially a commercial for Caterpillar. But it is my toddler's favorite show!
My 2 year old loves it, and I think it is pretty well done.
Great learning video.
My 3 year old son loves this one.
Kids love it but more realistic work would be better
It is the best construction widow for kids ever made!!!!
My 3 yr old loves the video...I even learned about construction.
My 2 year old makes us watch this over and over again. Totally beats any silly cartoon with made up characters !
My 18 month old downloaded this himself and loves it.
My grandson is 3 and just loved the big trucks
my 1 1/2 old grandson loves this show. he goes to sleep with it every afternoon at nap time
My child enjoys the train song and the machine demos.
My kids ages 5 & 3 loved this video and us as parents really enjoyed watching it with them as well!!

My two year old is obsessed with trucks and this movie, the "cat power" song and the characters are perfect! It's a daily watch and it's cute but it has also taught him the difference in each truck. Love it!
My 2 year old son and I have watched this at least 50 times and we love it. It shows all the construction machines and let's you know what REAL CAT POWER is!
3year old son loves machines and this was perfect
I love the history of the company that is included in the episode. My kids know the names of lots of construction vehicles. Entertaining!
My son loved it!
My grandson has watched this 30 times. (Probably more)
Poor quality.  My son who LOVES all kinds of trucks lots interest after five minutes or less
My boys love it!!
my boy loves this
My son watches this over and over again! It really helps to keep my 4 year old busy!
My grandson loves it
My 3 year old and I could watch this every day
My 2yr old loves this show!
Great show
Entertaining and educational! My kids love it!
My 3 yr old son LOVES this movie!
My 3 yer old son loves this show!

This will sound cliche, but our three year old son is all about construction, tractors, trains etc. After watching this numerous times on Prime I finally purchased it. It is very well done. My husband and I enjoy watching it too! I very much appreciate the simplicity and realistic aspect of it. There are two cartoon hosts but you mainly just hear them through most of the movie. There's no silly animation or talking equipment, annoying songs (though there is music) etc. ;)
It is the Catapillar company/equipment in action, and they made it super fun for kids and adults!
My toddler grandson loves this show.
My son loves this show!!!
My 2-yr old loves this
My 3 year old grandson is in heaven. Need I say more?
My son loves watching these giant cats!!

I give this 5 stars as my son will watch this over and over and never get tired of it. He is 3 and can identify all types of tractors and parts. It is nice to have something that he can watch that is not necessarily a cartoon ;)
My son is obsessed with this video. It's nice that it teaches them about the vehicles.
Great for the construction enthusiast! My 3 year old loves it.
Truly loved by a "FUTURE" construction worker!
My son loves this program.  He watches it over and over.
My son loves it.
This is the only show my grandson wants to watch right now.

my boys love watching this over and over
My son looves this show and watches it over and over!
My 3 year old loves trucks and this was a huge hit with him!
my boys love it!
My 3 year old son loved it
Great for a 2 year
My 2 year old is crazy about construction, and this is probably his favorite show.
My 2yo son is completely obsessed. I like that it's clear and factual, not dumbed-down for kids. He knows more about these vehicles than his pa-pa who worked at CAT his entire career.
Kept my grandsons actively engaged. They loved it!
Great for toddlers
My grand kids love it.

3 year old likes construction vehicles and trains. I think he has them all. This is a perfect video for him. He sees trucks on video and picks it from his collection. He also loves the song at the start of video, replays it over and over.
My son who is 2 loves to watch this show! Informative and entertaining
My grandson likes to watch this he enjoys watching and seeing what each Cat does.
My son loves this movie
Son loves this show
My two year old son LOVES this video. He watched it numerous times while traveling when we didn't have access to wifi.
My 3 year old grandson loves it!

My grandson asks for this did but....it does not hold his attention. You just need to know it is literally just a film of big equipment doing what they do.  It's okay but I probably would not have bought it if I'd known.
My 3 year old son loves this! We watch it daily.
My 2 year old son LOVES this movie.
My 3 year old grandson enjoys this video.  There are some parts that he skips thru.
My son loves construction trucks, he watches this over mighty machines
This is a great show for all ages.
My son loves this show.
My boys LOVE this show.. It is very cool to see all the big equipment close up.
My 2 year b old grandson loves tractors and loves this video! He watched it over and over again on our road trip this week.
My grandson watches this over and over and over again.  Thanks very much for having this available.
My two year old son loves this show.
Keeps grandson entertained and he's learned all the different machines.
Perfect movie for the truck lover in your life!
My 2 year old absolutely loves this and to be quite honest I don't mind it every now and then either
Best ever! My three year old knows every piece of Cat equipment!
My 4 year old loves it!!! This has been a fave of his for at least a year now. He has learned all the proper names for the equipment along with their jobs and fun facts.

This is one of my 2-year old son's favorites. We all have learned so much about construction machines. In addition, my son recognizes these machines as we drive to school or past any construction sites. This is great education and fun show for those kiddos who enjoy anything that moves - even those young at heart.
My grandson loves it, watches over and over.

This is the first movie my grandson, who is 2 and a half, actually stopped and watched from start to finish.  Watches it over and over. Has learned to focus on the things he is really interested in. Seems like cat trucks are it. Thank you!!!
My 3 year old said "I loved it.  I sort of had tears in my eyes I loved it so much."  It has a nice section in black and white with film of old caterpillar trucks.
Narrators are kind of annoying but my son loves it.
Did not know how Great Cat equipment is.
Love it
An all around great show for any young kid who loves construction. My son loves it!
Very cute, nice music too.  My boys love it!  And I don't mind watching it over and over and over....again
A little boy I babysit who is obsessed with all things equipment this show is perfect because it explains the equipment and what they do.

We purchased the Cat Machines on VHS many, many years ago when my kids were little.  They loved those videos.  They have since been worn out.  I decided to surprise them and buy them on DVD.  I came across this one that we had never seen and purchased it as well.  Even as teenagers they were so excited to get them and have watched them several times.  This is great for kids.

Bought this for my 3 yo son.  He sits watching it over and over, completely enthralled.  He is requesting his own construction equipment for Christmas.  I've watched it also, and it is very informative and entertaining.
My grandson(4) enjoyed it
My son loves this show! Thank you for making it!
My 4 year old loves this show and would watch it every single day if we would let him
My son loves this show
If your child loves heavy machinery and construction equipment, then this is the video for you. They will love it!
Great
My grandson  live it
2 year old grandson loves it!

My 2 year old son is obsessed with this "machine" show--he requests to watch it nearly every day, so I have to give it 5 stars. A bit cheesy for my taste, but it isn't geared towards adults, so that is to be expected I think. However, there is enough information about these Cats that even an adult might learn something from the show.
My 2 year old loves this video!

The five stars aren't for how much I love it but for my two year old son who is obsessed with tractors excavators bulldozers, etc. he begs to watch cat power almost every day and he is always totally focused...he really really enjoys this show and it'll be a hit for any kid who loves tractors and the like.  Warning for parents, the cheesy song will be stuck in your head so better to be prepared and just embrace it:)
My 3-year old enjoys construction vehicles.
5 year old has watched it multiple times and likes it
Great fun for my toddler son. Loves watching the trucks and learning about them.
My son loved it
Informative and Fun to watch
Our 3 year old loves watching it.
my 3 year old asks to watch this every day. It is short enough that he doesn't get bored and he learns a lot from it!
Son is always asking to watch!
Our little boy loves this
Kids love it...?
My boy loves it!
my 3 year old loves it! *educational
My 4 year old grandson loved this video - so many cool big machines - and it wasn't scary
Very entertaining

Five stars!!!  My three year old son loves this show.  He watches it every single day.  I wish there was more than one episode.  It is the perfect show for little boys who love construction.

The show introduces kids to all CAT types of machinery - names, how they work, etc.  There is also a part where kids get to guess whether the digger is real or a toy.  My son's favorite part is the construction equipment on the train.  Even I have learned a lot from just listening to the show.
My son LOVES this show! Very informative
My son enjoyed it
Good job

My son absolutely loves this video! His dad works for a Cat rental company so he knows all about the equipment. It is great for his age (3) because it has songs. I would definitely buy this again and I wish they would come out with more!!
My grandson LOVES this dvd.  It's busy enough that he sits and watches the whole thing and hasn't lost interest in it yet.
Educational and the kids loved watching it.
Great for little kids who stare out the window and get excited about construction equipment outside.  Their face just lights up with excitement.
Great show, our 3yr old loves it!
My son loves it! (And, secretly, I do to).  its very interesting and quite educational - as it relates to Cat vehicles.
My kids love this video
My grand son loves it  5 stars
My 3 year old loves trucks and he asks to watch this all the time.
